introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: At iGames.cloud, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.description: We may collect several types of information from and about users of our website and services, including:

items.personal: Personal identification information (such as name, email address, phone number)
items.usage: Usage data (such as how you interact with our website and services)
items.technical: Technical data (such as IP address, browser type, device information)
items.business: Business information (such as company name, job title, industry)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

items.services: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.communication: To communicate with you about our services, updates, and support
items.improvement: To analyze and improve our website and services
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. We limit access to your personal data to employees and third parties who have a business need to know.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Disclosure
thirdParty.description: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, and customer service. We may also disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights.

rights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right to access your personal data
items.rectification: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
items.erasure: Right to request deletion of your personal data
items.restriction: Right to restrict processing of your personal data
items.portability: Right to receive a copy of your personal data in a structured format
items.objection: Right to object to processing of your personal data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@igames.cloud.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: These Terms of Service govern your use of the iGames.cloud website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, you may not access our services.

serviceUse.title: Use of Services
serviceUse.description: When using our services, you agree to:

items.eligibility: Be at least 18 years old or have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms
items.account: Maintain the security of your account and accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
items.accurate: Provide accurate, current, and complete information when creating an account or using our services
items.security: Not share your account credentials or allow others to access your account

restrictions.title: Prohibited Activities
restrictions.description: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

items.illegal: Use our services for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws
items.harmful: Transmit any material that is harmful, threatening, abusive, or otherwise objectionable
items.impersonation: Impersonate any person or entity or falsely state your affiliation with a person or entity
items.infringement: Infringe upon or violate the intellectual property rights of others
items.interference: Interfere with or disrupt our services or servers or networks connected to our services

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The iGames.cloud website and services, including all content, features, and functionality, are owned by iGames.cloud and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.description: You retain ownership of any content you submit, post, or display on or through our services. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute such content.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.description: Our services are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the reliability, availability, or accuracy of our services.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: In no event shall iGames.cloud, its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which iGames.cloud is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@igames.cloud.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Our Commitment to Protecting Your Data and Systems

overview.title: Security Overview
overview.description: At iGames.cloud, security is a top priority. We employ industry-leading practices and technologies to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of your data and our services. Our comprehensive security program is designed to protect against threats while maintaining high performance and reliability.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement multiple layers of security to protect your data:

items.encryption: End-to-end encryption for all data in transit and at rest
items.access: Strict access controls and authentication mechanisms
items.monitoring: 24/7 monitoring for suspicious activities and potential breaches
items.compliance: Compliance with international data protection regulations

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Security
infrastructure.description: Our infrastructure is built with security as a foundational element:

items.redundancy: Redundant systems and regular backups to prevent data loss
items.ddos: Advanced DDoS protection to ensure service availability
items.firewall: Next-generation firewalls and intrusion detection systems
items.monitoring: Continuous infrastructure monitoring and vulnerability scanning

authentication.title: Authentication & Access Control
authentication.description: We implement robust authentication mechanisms to protect accounts:

items.mfa: Multi-factor authentication options for all accounts
items.passwordPolicy: Strong password policies and secure credential management
items.sessionManagement: Secure session management and automatic timeouts

development.title: Secure Development
development.description: Security is integrated throughout our development lifecycle:

items.sdlc: Secure Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) practices
items.codeReview: Regular code reviews and security testing
items.testing: Automated and manual security testing, including penetration testing
items.dependencies: Regular scanning and updating of dependencies to address vulnerabilities

incident.title: Incident Response
incident.description: We have a comprehensive incident response plan in place:

items.detection: Advanced threat detection and alerting systems
items.response: Dedicated security team with 24/7 response capabilities
items.communication: Transparent communication protocols for security incidents
items.recovery: Established recovery procedures to minimize impact

contact.title: Security Contact
contact.description: If you discover a potential security issue or have questions about our security practices, please contact our security team immediately at security@igames.cloud. We take all security concerns seriously and will respond promptly.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.subtitle: Our Commitment to Regulatory Standards and Best Practices

overview.title: Compliance Overview
overview.description: At iGames.cloud, we are committed to maintaining the highest standards of regulatory compliance and industry best practices. Our comprehensive compliance program ensures that our services meet or exceed applicable legal requirements and industry standards across all jurisdictions where we operate.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatory.description: We adhere to various regulatory frameworks, including:

items.gdpr: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for EU data protection
items.ccpa: California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) for California residents
items.hipaa: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) for healthcare data
items.pci: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) for payment processing
items.local: Local and regional regulations specific to gaming and sports betting industries

certifications.title: Certifications and Standards
certifications.description: We maintain various certifications and comply with industry standards:

items.soc2: SOC 2 Type II for security, availability, and confidentiality
items.pcidss: PCI DSS for secure payment processing
items.hipaa: HIPAA compliance for healthcare data protection

policies.title: Compliance Policies
policies.description: Our comprehensive set of policies ensures consistent compliance:

dataProtection.title: Data Protection Compliance
dataProtection.description: We implement robust data protection measures:

items.dpo: Designated Data Protection Officer (DPO) overseeing compliance
items.impact: Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIA) for high-risk processing
items.rights: Processes to fulfill data subject rights requests

auditing.title: Compliance Auditing and Monitoring
auditing.description: We maintain ongoing compliance through regular auditing:

items.internal: Regular internal compliance audits and assessments
items.penetration: Regular penetration testing and security assessments

contact.title: Compliance Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about our compliance program or need to report a compliance concern, please contact our compliance team at compliance@igames.cloud. We take all compliance matters seriously and will respond promptly.

hero.title: About

company.title: Our Company
company.description: Founded with a vision to revolutionize the sports technology landscape, iGames.cloud has grown from a small startup to a globally recognized leader in sports APIs and gaming solutions. We combine cutting-edge technology with deep industry expertise to deliver solutions that drive success for our clients worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
